quotes.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, I will try again tomorrow.
Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
We cannot all succeed when half of us are held back.
Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
Achievement seems to be connected with action. Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
We may not all live holy lives, but we live in a world alive with holy moments.
Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our Light, not our Darkness, that most frightens us.
Forget about the fast lane. If you really want to fly, just harness your power to your passion.
When we argue for our limitations, we get to keep them.
Laughter gives us distance. It allows us to step back from an event, deal with it and then move on.
Always be a first-rate version of yourself instead of a second-rate version of someone else.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Life is not about waiting for the storms to passâ€¦ It's about learning how to dance in the rain.
We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the life that is waiting for us.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
When nothing is sure, everything is possible.
You can't just hope for happy endings. You have to believe in them. Then do the work, take the risks.
The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
Divide and conquer must become define and empower.
When you forgive, you heal your own anger and hurt and are able to let love lead again. It's like spring cleaning for your heart.
He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed on an equal or greater benefit.
The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
Always go with the choice that scares you the most, because that's the one that is going to require the most from you
Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
Stand up and walk out of your history.
Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

I always tell my kids if you lay down, people will step over you. But if you keep scrambling, if you keep going, someone will always, always give you a hand. Always. But you gotta keep dancing, you gotta keep your feet moving.
There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
Whenever an emotion overtakes you, if even once you can just be without moving your body, without co-operatin with your emotion you wil be liberated from that emotion.
As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others.
When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
When life knocks you down, try to land on your back because if you can look up, you can get up.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of someone elses life with perfection.
Every morning is a new beginning, a new chance for you to rewrite the story of your life.
Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. The fearful are caught as often as the bold.
Everything you are against weakens you. Everything you are for empowers you.
Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask yourself if you want to be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future.
Let individuals create real wealth, empower them, create something that they can leave for their children.
Happiness is an attitude. We either make ourselves miserable, or happy and strong. The amount of work is the same.
I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning to sail my ship.
It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
